name: DeadLand VR
detailed_description:
“Optimized graphics done right in VR.” - eEurogamere
“Proven VR shooter mechanics and a real sense of fun” - Wireded
"A generous wodge of the most enjoyable kind of schlock vr horror shooting" - PC Games N Stuff

The cult vr horror shooter series comes to an apocalyptic conclusion with an epic new third chapter, a heart-pumping new horde mode, and remastered the art of the best-selling VR Zombie Shooting Games.

In the dying flames of Ruined City, Creeps have unleashed one final, unholy gamble – a legion of undead super Zombies & Monsters that threatens to overwhelm the whole of Apocalypse. You have to Fight to save up the humanity from the zombies & monsters menace in this apocalyptic first person shooter!

Battle through 30+ epic unlimited levels across 10 demon-infested missions. Dare you take on one of the most intense and challenging first person shooters in gaming?

Face gruesome enemies with iconic weaponry and powerful explosives. Dismember the undead to give yourself a fighting chance, and experience every putrid lung burst, every rotten bone shatter with the infamous X-ray Kill Camera.

The ultimate horror package – with Multiple guns with attachments
Experience TEN nerve-shredding campaigns across THIRTY+ missions of intense vr first person shooter action.
Take the fight to the undead alone, or team up(Coming Soon)
Face your fears in the brutal new Horde Mode for 1-4 players, across 5 blood-curdling maps.

Gut-wrenching gunplay
Defeat harrowing legions of zombies, armored monsters, fire demons, chainsaw-wielding elites - and worse - before facing the demonic Führer himself!
Shred the undead with genre-best rifle ballistics, powerful firearms and deadly explosive traps.
Wince as your bullets shred the insides of the undead in gruesome detail

Customize your carnage
Randomly get from 7+ Pickable Guns, with multiple type of attachments.
Perfect your play style with multiple arenas - defend your base.
Surely you would never brave “X4” on Gunner Elite difficulty ... or would you?

Recut. Remastered. Unleashed.
Includes the VR Zombies games like you’ve never seen them before.
Pick apart zombies with the new DISMEMBERMENT mechanic and bathe in a bloody glow of NEW graphical effects, NEW audio, NEW enemy animations ... and more.
Play through all the levels for new place and zombies everytime and have a new experience of

short_description: Deadland VR is a story about when Zombie Appolcapyse Happens, Everyone Runs and Hid. Except for us Gamers who've been waiting for this day all life... Are you the One...? If So, then better hold your position, gather up your Guns and Load-up, because these creatures Run, Fly and Shoot.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB External
  • DirectX: Version 8.2
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core I7 or more
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 7 series or Above
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB External
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
